extendedInfo.description: View and share your location: city, zipcode, phone area code, rough street address, sunrise and sunset times, GPS latitude and longitude.Changes in 1.1-1.10:- Tablet support- Keeping the screen on- 'Clear trail' option- Maps link when sending- County, state- Sun set, sun rise times

reviews.title: Great for 4x4ing off-road use
reviews.comment: i wanted an app that would show Lat-Long in decimal format so i can plot 4x4ing off-road excursions when i return home. This one rocks! Will now log each major photo or photo cluster with geospatial data. Sweet! i\'m on an HTC EVO and the installation was perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great and simple
reviews.comment: Very easy to use, a kid can use it. In few clicks it sends your location, with a formatted URL on google maps as well.
reviews.author: Majed Aly

reviews.title: PLEASE ADD....
reviews.comment: Ability to save locations.  So a user can track points they\'ve been for future recall...thanks!  This especially helps when lost or to record the location of the scene of an incident, accident, etc.  Also, option to call contacts or EMERGENCY numbers with Where Am I location in popup box.  Great app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: My husband & I are truck drivers. We frequently need to know the name of a town we are near and sometimes our GPS doesn\'t know if we are in between cities or in remote areas. Thanks for a great app. Droid X (old!)
reviews.author: Tom Gonzales

reviews.title: Won\'t ever turn off!!
reviews.comment: Restarts itself after killing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Takes a little bit to load some times but other than that it\'s perfect!
reviews.author: keith scholz

reviews.title: Where am I ?
reviews.comment: Very cool app. I like it very much?                            Eddie Walker
reviews.author: Eddie Walker

reviews.comment: Fantastic app! So helpful to have. Car ran out of gas in middle of nowhere. I was able to give AAA info they needed, plus coordinates! Saved my life!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: After few days of using it, the data keeps stops working
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best of all others I try , love it !!!!!  Gloria
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple & Good
reviews.comment: Pretty accurate most of the times... The best thing I like about this app is the ability to share the location.
reviews.author: Srinivasa Rao Yerra

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.comment: Its working very nice but small displayed.
reviews.author: bhaskararao r

reviews.title: A. Taylor
reviews.comment: great app I use it all the time. for the most part it\'s pretty accurate all the time I have never had any problems with this app working on my phone.
reviews.author: Anthony Taylor

reviews.title: Where am I?
reviews.comment: It\'s a handy / easy tool to use on the go when trying to coordinate meet-up points on the fly. No problems on my Galaxy Note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t kill it
reviews.comment: Cool app, I like the functionality except it runs continuosly and it won\'t close, so I\'m uninstalling it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Worth a download , Could just get you out of a pickle if lost. recommended
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung nexus SimpleMobile
reviews.comment: Excellent service I used a lot on my vacation

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very helpful to have!

reviews.title: Where am I
reviews.comment: Hey very complete and accurate description of where you are at at any time. Perfect.
reviews.author: Jamie G.

reviews.title: This app is awesome!!
reviews.comment: Would be nice to show the current time. Highly recommended. Thank you dev.
